name: Nemo
description: Nemo is a file manager developed based on Files 3.4 code. It has the function of Nautilus file manager, as well as file comparison, preview, sharing and other special functions.

en_US.description: Nemo is a file manager developed based on Files 3.4 code. It has the function of Nautilus file manager, as well as file comparison, preview, sharing and other special functions.
en_US.name: Nemo

zh_CN.description: Nemo是一款文件管理器，基于Files 3.4代码开发，具有Nautilus文件管理器的功能，同时还有文件比较、预览、分享等特有功能。
zh_CN.name: Nemo
